channel.title: Redmi Note 10 Pro MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater
channel.description: Your best website to track MIUI ROM releases!

image.title: Redmi Note 10 Pro MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

item.title: MIUI V13.0.4.0.SKFMIXM Fastboot update for Redmi Note 10 Pro Global
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi Note 10 Pro Global

Codename: sweet

Version: V13.0.4.0.SKFMIXM | 12.0

Size: 5.7 GB

MD5: 3335c0280f88ce325369833cfa7aa83c

Changelog:
[MIUI 13]
New: "Crystallization" super wallpapers
New: A new widget ecosystem with app support
Optimization: Improved overall stability
[System]
Stable MIUI based on Android 12
Updated Android Security Patch to January 2022. Increased system security.
[Wallpaper]
New: "Crystallization" super wallpapers
[More features and improvements]
New: Apps can be opened as floating windows directly from the sidebar
Optimization: Enhanced accessibility support for Phone, Clock, and Weather
Optimization: Mind map nodes are more convenient and intuitive now

Download: Here
